languages.text: "Вы забыли добавить, что я также пользовал{mf|ся|ась} запрещенными в Империуме ксенотехнологиями и сбывал{mf||а} их своим союзникам по всему Простору".

traits.locale_text: "Вы забыли добавить, что я также пользовал{mf|ся|ась} запрещенными в Империуме ксенотехнологиями и сбывал{mf||а} их своим союзникам по всему Коронусу".

languages.text: "You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Вы забыли добавить, что я также пользовал{mf|ся|ась} запрещенными в Империуме ксенотехнологиями и сбывал{mf||а} их своим союзникам по всему Простору".

traits.locale_text: "You forgot to add I was also using the xeno-technologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."
"You forgot to add I was also using the xeno-technologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."
"You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."
"You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."
"You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."
"You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."

languages.text: « Vous avez oublié de mentionner que j'utilisais également des xénotechnologies interdites par l'Imperium et que je les vendais à mes associés dans toutes les Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez oublié de mentionner que j'utilisais également des technologies xénos interdites par l'Imperium et que je les vendais à mes associés dans toutes les Étendues. »

languages.text: “还有一点你忘了提：我使用了帝国禁止的异形技术，还把这些技术卖给了整个科罗努斯扩区的同伙。”
languages.original_text: "You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “还有一点你忘了提：我使用了帝国禁止的异形技术，还把这些技术卖给了整个科罗努斯扩区的同伙。”

languages.text: 「私が帝国で禁止されている異星技術を使用し、エクスパンス中の仲間に売っていたことが触れられてないぞ」
languages.original_text: "You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「私が帝国で禁止されている異星技術を使用し、エクスパンス中の仲間に売っていたことが触れられてないぞ」

languages.text: "Ihr habt vergessen zu erwähnen, dass ich auch Xenotechnologien einsetzte habe, die im Imperium verboten sind, und sie in der ganzen Ausdehnung an meine Partner verkaufte."
languages.original_text: "You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt vergessen zu erwähnen, dass ich auch Xenotechnologien einsetzte habe, die im Imperium verboten sind, und sie in der ganzen Ausdehnung an meine Partner verkaufte."

languages.text: «Olvida añadir que también he usado xenotecnología prohibida por el Imperium y la he vendido a mis asociados por toda la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Olvida añadir que también he usado xenotecnología prohibida por el Imperium y la he vendido a mis asociados por toda la Extensión».

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'ta yasaklı zeno teknolojilerini kullandığımı ve bunları Enginlik'in dört bir yanındaki ortaklarıma sattığımı eklemeyi unuttun."
languages.original_text: "You forgot to add I was also using the xenotechnologies that are banned in the Imperium and sold them to my associates all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'ta yasaklı zenoteknolojileri kullandığımı ve bunları Enginlik'in dört bir yanındaki partnerlerime sattığımı eklemeyi unuttun."
